# [Interview #1138: Shadows of Self-Beaverton, OR, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1138#2)

#### WayneSpren

Can Shardblades cut aluminum?"

#### Brandon Sanderson

"Well-um-yes, yes they can."
